item.title: Guide to Summer
item.description: Guide to Summer Internships Internships have three different uses: Do something you cannot ever have time to do, such as studying abroad (See [[You should study abroad]]) Advance yourself in a career as fast as possible Explore and find out what you do not want to do.

item.title: Juniors dropping all their extracurriculars
item.description: Juniors dropping all their extracurriculars When thinking about [[Jaded juniors]], I think about my friends My friend involved in MSA (Muslim Society) dropped MSA My friend involved in Orchestra dropped Orchestra My friend involved in YDA dropped YDA The result is that everyone References (References:: undefined)

item.title: Don't Use a Keyboard Cover
item.description: Don’t Use a Keyboard Cover It’s so much better and fun to type on your Macbook’s Keyboard. It also ruins your MacBook’s Display (leaves marks on it), causes it to overheat due to thermal insulation, and therefore decreases your battery life.

item.title: I Almost Didn't Apply to Yale in London
item.description: I Almost Didn’t Apply to Yale in London Applied with two days left, asked my Dean. References (References:: Outliers Chapter 8: Rice Paddies and Math Tests Summary & Analysis | LitCharts)

item.title: If You Want to Get Super Rich, It Will Happen Quickly, Not Slowly
item.description: If You Want to Get Super Rich, It Will Happen Quickly, Not Slowly You can get rich slowly with a high-paying job, but getting super rich often requires quick and exponential growth.

item.description: Be Wise with Your Words The most powerful people know that they can accomplish a lot with just a flick of a finger.

item.title: Advice for Generalists at Yale
item.description: Advice for Generalists at Yale You’re already in the top 99% of many disciplines. Do not confuse the fact that you are not in the top 99.
